summary: I HAVE MULTIPLE CRACKS FORMED ON MY DASH PANEL OVER THE INSTRUMENT CLUSTER ONE IS VERY LARGE I KNOW THIS IS A MAJOR ISSUE ON THIS VEHICLE AND COULD CAUSE INJURY IF IN A ACCIDENT. THE VEHICLE WAS SITTING IN MY DRIVEWAY WHEN THIS HAPPENED.THIS IS A WIDESPREAD PROBLEM THAT GM HAS REFUSED TO ACKNOWLEDGE. THERE ARE THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE AFFECTED BY THIS. THIS DASHBOARD SHOULD BE RECALLED. IT SERIOUSLY IMPACTS OUR RESALE VALUE.
